short_summary: One (1) Electronic Disposal Unit (EDU) Training Unit Truck
description: The Contractor will require one (1) EDU Training Unit Truck with an option for one (1) additional Truck.
full_summary:
================================
### Electronic Disposal Unit (EDU) Training Unit Truck Procurement

#### Tender Information

- **Notice Title (English)**: M9062-241736 - Electronic Disposal Unit (EDU) Training Unit Truck
- **Notice Title (French)**: M9062-241736 - Camion du groupe de formation du groupe d’élimination de matériel électronique (EDU)
- **Reference Number**: WS4220062246-Doc4288767525
- **Amendment Number**: 3
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4220062246
- **Publication Date**: February 22, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date and Time**: April 15, 2024 at 14:00 EST
- **Amendment Date**: April 10, 2024
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 31, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2027

#### Tender Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires one (1) Electronic Disposal Unit (EDU) Training Unit Truck with an option for one (1) additional truck. The scope of work includes the procurement, delivery, and acceptance of the EDU Training Unit Truck, as well as the provision of any necessary support and maintenance.

#### Solicitation Details

- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: CETA, CUFTA, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, CPTPP, CKFTA, CPFTA, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, CFTA, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, CCFTA, WTO GPA

#### Contact Information

- **Contact Person**: Matheson, Valerie (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email Address**: valerie.matheson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Phone Number**: None

#### Notice URL

- **Notice URL (English)**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18867907?extsite=MTg4Njc5MDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
- **Notice URL (French)**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18867907?extsite=MTg4Njc5MDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA
